values:
Well seems every one has jumped on the My-Space wagon, I have one but have realized that i dont really like it.

So things have been going really well.

I have quit my job and am going to school YAY!!

Shannon and I are agreeably happy... almost one year, and still not a divorce statistic!

Yes we do have our arguments but anyone who says that they do not have a tiff once in a while is a liar. That is not possible and it would make things very boring. 

I like living.

Well today has been nothing less than a realistic blow to the head. 

It all began when Shannon woke me up this morning when he got off work as usual. But, this morning it wasnt the typical kisses and loves. This moring he woke me up because he was in pain. For those of you who dont know Shannon works in the coal mines on night shift. Last night he was working on a piece of machinery and it blew up, when it blew up it knocked him off of his feet and into a wall, at the same time the light was so bright that he couldnt even see for about 3 min. Somehow he managed not to get burned except for the hairs on his arms. 

This made me realize how close I came to loosing him. Its one of those harsh realities that hit you like a ton of bricks. To have him wake me up this moring was actually a miracle. As we sat in the emergency room this morning it felt like I was smothering. I couldnt even imagine life without him. Even now tears fall as i think of how empty my life would be. On top of all these emotions I had to sit helplessly by his side as he lay on a hospital cot in agony. I wished a hundred times over that i could have been in his place. I had never had to experience those emotions before and I dont even know how to explain it or even if there is a word to call it. 

At any rate we found out that he fractured his tail bone, something that they cant do any thing about so they gave him some pain pills and sent him on his way. So now my ex-drug addict husband has been legally issued pain killers. Not the best thing in the world, so hopefully this does not make him digress. 


Its true that life can vanish in an instant. Hanging on to every instant is the only way to live.

well so far i dont have to have surgry, i guess we will see!

Patti

So far this week has been less than joyful.

Turns out i have a cyst on my lower back, near my butt bone which is what was causeing me  much of my back problems, and it just came to the surface. So Sunday Shannon made me go to the ER, and they had to drain all the goo from the cyst, That was the most pain i have ever been in in my life, even with shots to numb it. And now i have to take antibiotics and pain killers that make me SO WOOSEY! But I had to go to my first visit with my new doctor today to have the packing taken out. What a way to make a good first impression! I has hoping that draining it would be all that was needed to be done but Dr. Leslie thinks i will have to have surgery to remove it. Wendsday I have to go to yet another Doctor to have it checked out. I DO NOT WANT TO HAVE SURGERY!!!

Because of all this i am going to miss so much work, now i wish i hadnt joked with cayci about contracting her kidney ecoli..... ERRR. be carefull little mouth what you say. 


Lets hope everything goes well

~much love~
Patti

Hey CATS 

I know its been a while since i last posted so heres my updates.


I got married
Im happy 


Not much else has happened lol


~much love~
Patti

i hate today. i have this unshakable feeling of doom about to occur... i hate feeling doomed for no reason... i wonder what terrible thing is going to happen.

 i hAVE now noticed that i no longer have any friends... cayci and shannon... thats it. oh well.

god im in a mood.

Hmmmmm... i shall go out of seclusion, and update.

in six monthes and one day i will be a married woman... hmmm... strange.
then what? children? not for a while i think... although shannon wants 4 children!! 4? i think not, 2 maybe....? But first i want to finish school, which mean actually going back to school, how incredibly wastful of me to not go back. 

shannon and i are fixing up a beautiful old home to live in when we get married.. ok who am i kidding its a junky pile of shit trailer that my great grandma used to live in.  I HATE IT!  It is horrid!!! i dont even want to talk about it ne more. death to my old rotten trailer.

I miss my friends i would love one more day at central but one of the good days where you get to skip school or something hahaha.

I think the best feeling in the world is when you are completly and utterly in love. 
 
10 ways to know you are REALLY in love

1 You think about them constanly
2 it takes three minutes and one kiss to stop being mad at them
3 thier farts dont bother you anymore
4 you would rather spend time with them than watch Aqua Teen
5 You only fight about meaningful things like the remote or who loves who more
6 Your best friend likes them
7  one or both of your parents hate them
8 You want to jump there bones when they tell you "you got a purdy mouth"
9 you hate their car cause they spend time with it
10 thier dog is jealous of you


welp im ottie( well actually im an innie)
~much love~
PATTI

PS IM TOO LAZY FOR SPEL CHEEK LOL

So cayci and i started at wal-mart today... we didnt really do ne thing but sit around answering questions on a computer and filling out more papers.... but we got paid for sitting around for 4 hours so hey.. its all good. Its gonna feel so weird to no wear a uniform to  work, i mean yeah i have to wear the smock but big deal. And no greasy food.. im excited. Cashiering i hope will be good. 

My sister got hit by linsy weddington today in the school parking lot..  shes ok but her driverside door will nolonger open... and all of this mahem was a product of willie freebody having a drivers license.


On another note... can someone please explain to me how someone can tell you that you are "THE ONE" after dating for 1 month and some odd days? why do guys always want to move so fast with me... i cant handle this whole falling in love thing again... i know i love him but i hate loving him because sooner or later its goiung to come back to bite me in the ass.. nothing is ever as good as it seems. I guess im just gonna have to hang on to it as long as i can and then just let go im getting used to that... God i ramble lol. one day at i time i guess.

quote of the day  "your dying for it" hehehehe


~MUCH LOVE~
patti

GOOD things
I quit wendys
shannon is buying me a guinea pig
i watched caycis python eat a mouse
i started my period
cayci and i start work at walmart next week
I am happy with shannon


*quote of the day* "Shut up you damn duck!" and "Get that GODDAMN MOUSE out of my fucking car!" lol those were both me and there was an actual duck, 2 mice, and 24 crickets in my car today.

ah lastnight my love and cayci and brotherman and my sister and Amber G and jade and bonea met up at that band deal going on at pikeville college... im sure every hard core punk kid in that place who knew me and cayci thought we were posers but guess the fuck what i like that music too so who gives a flying shit if i dont wear fucking dog collars... ne ways the last band was great and we enjoyed ourselves very much... I miss my school friends alas... Amber calls shannon boyfriend which is funny... i met shanons "BESTFRIEND COUSIN" nick which was fun cause hes stupid lol and had all kinds of animal heads hanging in his living room. amber made out with the goat head haha J/K but the best part was when amber officially welcomed my man into our circle by giving him the infamouse chicken humping hahah i also got in trouble for staying out tooo late and i can not go ne where besides work for 2 weeks hmmm... 

sean i love you.

I wonder every day about the decisions ive made and if they are wrong... sometimes i jump too fast i suppose.. what is it with me and my horrid efforts to NEVER be alone.. I like shannon but i dont know if im ready for him... i dont know if im ready for ne thing.

quote: "FEEL MY FEET... they are really warm..." my mother... and we all know how i feel about feet.


Party tomorrow im cited.

Havnt posted in a while just been a lil busy i guess.. what with my best friend going crazy and work and stuff...

Hmmm... well I have a new BF hes good... i mean he treats me good... everyone has thier problems his just happens to be an addiction... but i really care about him... Cayci hates him.. which is funny cause he tries so hard to make her like him and she dosnt even know it... 

Cayci is going crazy... taking happy pills which make her hate me... yeah they work... shes spending the night with me so its not like im saying shit behind her back for those of you who would think such a horris thing...  Cayci says "the world is a conspiracy evolving against me" which is her excuse for getting her head shrunk... 

oh and mike thanks for letting the world know that your ass was in pikeville lol... oh wait you did on ur lj but you could have picked up the phone and let me and cayci know... *tear* i guess it will be ok lol..

while cayci is nuts shes dragging me along lol... 

my brother has a big ugly nose...

I miss sean...

I saw Saw with cayci and i LOVED it.

THE GRUDGE IS STUPID!!!

the end

~much love~
PATTI IN A WONDERBRA

I dyed my hair very very red and it looks hott...

Im gonna find out what ever happened to my louie he was great...

V-day will suck..

I hate soupbeans... and sourkrawt....

I caught the chilli stove at work on fire yesterday....

Ok so i had a good lil chat with a friend that i havnt really talked to in a while last night and it was fun.... 

Then tonight someone at work kissed me and asked me out... I hant even been single a week and im not ready for that at all... i told him id think about it but it would cause so many problems if i did considering who it is and who they have been with at work and all sorts if things... very hush hush this all is cause missylissa i know you know who im talking about lol..


Much love
patti

Ok Jay and i are broke up... hurray for that.....
My only regret is being so close to his family and haveing to drop them.. this is sad.


NE ways went to eku with Cayci and missylissa and it was fun I love Caycis friends, They were really fun! we hung out in Fraces dorm and sang songs.... then miky david and us girls went bowling and ate pizza.. I got my alltime high score of 85 woot woot!!!! made me happy. then we went to the foster building and we met this girl named amber who was an idiot and i wanted to stab her because she made jessica simpson look like einstein!!! eek!! Mikey kept saying "for serious" and david was funny, I kept trying to get them to pronounce pike county the way we do with a long i,... it was "good times" 

well im tired lol

~much love~

Well I have made decision to the question I have been stewing about.... and later tonight i will be a single gal... I love Jay I mean i REALLY love him... but hes taken every thing I have that is actually mine.. my trust, my virginity, my heart, and my faith, I will not let him take my dignity as well I have jepordized that way to much in the past as it will and i know this.

1 I cannot make him want to be with me
2 I cannot make him happy
3 I cannot make him love me

So there is nothing left to do except in Jays words "pull up my pants and leave" i wold like nothing more in the world then to make this work but i know his mother was right he is too much like his father.. a sad thing. He will never meet somone else who loves him like I do and treats him like I do.. I however have no fear that somewhere someone will love me. The beginning of the rest of my life. 

to anyone who reads this and knows Jay please do not reveal that our end was premetitated because i dont thing that would be the appropriate thing to do.

in other news cayci and i are venturing to EKU on thurdsday and will be there at about noon, Missylissa is traveling with us and i have informed the rents that I have to go to whitesburg that day because of work... so this operation is very hush hush. Im excited to meet all Caycis friends and have a good time. So ne one in the area who wants to see us drop me a line and we'll arange some kinda somthing or another lol.

I have found that putting to much thought on any certain subject is not a good idea... in-depth thought proves only to complicate an otherwise simple matter. It can cause one to invent things.. such as forming something or someone into a pillar of perfectness where there should be fault, and finding faults where there are none. Have you ever heard the old cliche "let sleeping dogs lie"? well that has a whole new meaning for me.. Incandescent ramblings of one who has the greatest fear of loss. 

I have found that I am a creature of habit, and I tend to plan things too far ahead.. I suppose that i thought I NEEDED to have everything set straight before it was time.. This i have discovered is one of my many follies... I seem to want things that can never be and despise things I already have.. Just food for thought, though i wish my thoughts were starved instead of overly nourished.


On another note, I have heard nothing of my dear friend sean in the past few days and I am wondering what has become of him... Sean dear if you happen to read the words of this idiot please let me know how you are, its not like you to disappear.

The story of my life is planning to do something and then being forced to forget about it lol. i havnt had a saturday off from work for 8 months and when i finally do and have big great plans the roads are horrid hey se-rah se-rah... lol


I miss dramatic highschool... well not really haha.

I camped out on your doorstep so i could see the rising sun.


~much love~
Patti

Ok so today rocked!!! 
Jay and I are making real progress... (breaks are not the end of the world... they work) he kissed me after work tonight and Cayci make fun of me because i was so happy about getting a kiss from someone I was engaged to and has given me the worlds greatest *bleep* (censored to protect those with virgin eyes, and of course my dear sister who would rather not read about my escapades in *bleep*) But i was so excited and It was wonderful to feel his lips against mine again and hear those three beautiful words.... ok im getting all mushy and noone wants to hear that.

Well for christmas my cayci gave me a hamster that i didnt want after it bit me but i kept and now i love her... lisa bought scabbers a hamster ball today (it would be ridiculous to get her a guinea pig ball) That was sweet of my dear sister..

And i must apologies to Lisa for being a *bleep* to her for the past few days... i sorry sister i was irritated... the whole thought of loosing my love made me disgruntled and you unfortunately walked into my path and were hit with me *bleep* rays... sorry.

Going to the boarderline saterday... if it dosnt snow... i went once and didnt like it but with bad company noone has fun.. perhaps this time will be better... If ryan and brandon dont go with me and cayci then us girls from work are going to have a girl snight out which will be fun.

Well fans of ThE QuEeN, (lol) i must depart 
~much love~
The Patti

well Jay and I are on a "BREAK" not broken up but not together... does that make sence? well because we fight like a republican and a democrat in a steel cage its best that we take time to fix us.. i love him more than anyone or anything i have ever had affection for in my life.. it was hard to accept that we need this but im sure it is the right thing to do.. i feel empty without his ring on my finger... not the ring but what it represents... perhaps we jumped too fast like everyone says but i really do love him.. not school girl crushes like ive had before and not simple infatuation like ive had before but true and passionate love.. well thats enough of that... lol

Snow is bad... i hate it.... its beautiful but it made me stranded at work... daddy came and got me i was gonna spend the night with my cayci but daddy shoed up just and her dad was getting ready to take us home... oh well

I love cayci being home... i know that shed rather be at school and i wish that i had gone too but things happen... im glad that we get to spend more time together now it makes me happy.

life is monotonus nothing exciting ever happens.. i work too much.

well once again i have neglected my LJ but no more i say... 

I miss everyone...
Cayci is staying home this sememster so im glad of that in a way
but i miss Ryan
Duke called me and that good i miss him too

things are complicated when you decide to marry someone...

~much love~
patti

Ive just been sitting here reading everyones lj and realising how much i am missing by not going away to college... ive cried for so long about how much i miss cayci and duke and that duke hasnt tried to contact me and cayci either since they have been able to be friends again... i feel so unneeded like cayci dosnt need me ne more because she has all these new friends and now she even has duke back... i wish that i could change so much of my life... i need a hug so bad that its not even funny...
well good news gang.. jay and i had a long talk and we have worked alot of owr problems out which makes me very happy.. thanks to yall that have been here for me

as of late jay and i have been arguing something terrible... i am so tired of it... i feel like he dosnt even want to be around me much less engaged to me... we havnt spent ne "quality" tome together in at least 3 weeks and i am getting rather fed up.. perhaps i need to evaluate things a lil more clearly...

I know ive been really lazy on updating but so much has gone on that its really been hard to find time to breathe never the less here i am... i guess its pointless to try to go back over what has happened to ill just skip ahead to today.
Cayci came in today so we desided to go to the movies... but we wanted to bowl first.... we forgot that they are shutting down the mark so there we were with nothing to do before the movie. 
I was just kidding around and suggested that we go play Bingo... and we did. 
Bing Bingo virgins we had no idea about how to go about getting started... and the guy at the counted asked us if we had blotters.... needless to say we didnt know what the hell a blotter was.. (its the marker thingy used to mark your numbers)
there were like .001% young people at the Bingo place yet one chick came and sat withus and explaind stuff to us... who knew bingo was so complex.
There are some old lady's that take it very seriously... they have sepcially made bags to hold thier blotters... its funny.
there was one evil looking old woman sitting at the next table who yelled out "son of a bitch" when another person yelled bingo. Then she sat there complaining about how much she hated bingo... hmmm....
It was a vey interesting day.

Ok recap since i havnt written in a while.

1 My uncle Joey (joe colemans dad) passes away suddenly of a heary attack...he was only 45 and usually very heatlthy... i loved him and i miss him.

2 same day jays uncle died

3 my other uncle gets put in the hospital

4 his holy terror children take up residence here

5 i miss an anatomy exam because i have to watch them

6 Timmy Joe's (my dads best friend and my moms cousin) mother is put in the hosptial. Janice (shane mays grandma.) 

7 my mamaw Flossie is told she is on the verdge of a heart attack

8 I miss a lab practical

9 I stood up to my parents and told them i will not be a nurse

10 at this point i have missed ALOT of work and have seen Jay very little

11 Ash and i get mad at each other at work

12 last night jay and i stay at work talking until 4:30 am... 

13 Janice died while we were still at work

14 I miss more work but i come in late

15 Jay says his mother is quite unpleased with me

16 cayci is in this weekend but i dont think we will be able to hang out because i promised jay the whole day sat and i have to go to a funeral sunday... then she goes back and i need her so bad right now 

I have had a bad week.... i need a hug.

I'm so excited i got to see a picture of my engagement ring!!!!! OH my God it is beautiful!!! And i found out that on Christmas I will be officially asked to marry him lol. He asked me what i was going to say... I guess ill just tell him maybe later lol... no im kidding... i love Jay.
I do have a problem though... with the whole maid of honor deal.. how is a person supposed to have 3 maids of honor and one bride maid lol.... I think that ill have ash and cayci as my maids of honor and lisa and amber my bridemaids... geez lol. (i wonder how that would go over) Well its not like i dont have 3 years to think this stuff over lol...
i am feeling very low.... its tims like these that i wish my Cayci was still here... i miss her. I don't know whats wrong with me. Life's a bitch and then you die.

Today is my sisters b-day, horray for her!!!! Happy b-day my dear I love you despite yourself  hahaha!!!!

Work tonight.

I dont have anything to bitch about so i guess this entry was all in vain. lol

~much love~

Ok i know that i havnt updated in quite a while, however that is because life as of late has been complety full and i havnt had time to breathe much less spend my time on my silly lil journal.... which i actually find comforting at times. 

School isnt so horrid ne more.... i actually kinda like being able to actually listen in my classes apposed to talking as i am accustomed lol. (except in Gillis's class w/ Kel but that dosnt count lol)

Work is still a bitch except for Ash and Jay... but it pays the bills who am i to complain?

Love?!?!?!? me? yes actually i have fallen in love.... its quite amazing how a person can change your veiws on everything by just showing that they truthfully care about you and are not interested in you soley for physical reasons (however those physical reason have become a plus to the love we share) At one time in my life i never thought i would ever care about another guy in my life but it has happened and every minute has been completly earth shattering. We have no secrets from eachother, even my past (which he dosnt approve of but accepts me for who i was and who i am now) I couldnt ask for a better boyfriend than Jay. He makes me happy, hopefully we will share a good future together. 

I miss Cayci despite what she may think, its really hard living life without ur bestfriend to turn to whenever you need her....it feels like she is a million miles away.... i miss ya babes and i love ya.

Ryan i hope u made the right decision and are happier.
